updateMember.name: updateMember
updateMember.label: Update a Member

expect.help:
`All Mail`: All messages, delivered as soon as they arrive. 
`Daily`: No more than one message a day. 
`Digest`: Up to 25 messages bundled into a single message. 
`Disabled`: Remove subscription. 
`None`: No messages.
expect.name: delivery_settings
expect.label: Delivery Settings

expect.help:
`Owner`: This role can send messages to the group, add or remove members, change member roles, change group's settings, and delete the group. 
`Manager`:  This role is only available if the Google Groups for Business is enabled using the Admin console. A manager role can do everything done by an owner role except make a member an owner or delete the group.
`Member`: his role can subscribe to a group, view discussion archives, and view the group's membership list.
expect.name: role
expect.label: Role

updateMember.description: Updates a member in a specified group.

google-groups.name: google-groups
google-groups.label: Google Groups

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/admin.di: Global scope for access to all group operations, including group aliases and members.

parameters.help: Use this to get an access to extra scopes.
parameters.name: scopes
parameters.label: Additional Scopes

getGroupSetting.code:
function getGroupSetting(item) {

    const keys = [
        'id', 'title', 'apps:email',
        'apps:allowExternalMembers',
        'apps:allowGoogleCommunication',
        'apps:allowWebPosting',
        'apps:archiveOnly',
        'apps:customFooterText',
        'apps:customReplyTo',
        'apps:customRolesEnabledForSettingsToBeMerged',
        'apps:defaultMessageDenyNotificationText',
        'apps:description',
        'apps:enableCollaborativeInbox',
        'apps:favoriteRepliesOnTop',
        'apps:includeCustomFooter',
        'apps:includeInGlobalAddressList',
        'apps:isArchived',
        'apps:maxMessageBytes',
        'apps:membersCanPostAsTheGroup',
        'apps:messageDisplayFont',
        'apps:messageModerationLevel',
        'apps:name',
        'apps:replyTo',
        'apps:sendMessageDenyNotification',
        'apps:showInGroupDirectory',
        'apps:spamModerationLevel',
        'apps:whoCanAdd',
        'apps:whoCanAddReferences',
        'apps:whoCanApproveMembers',
        'apps:whoCanApproveMessages',
        'apps:whoCanAssignTopics',
        'apps:whoCanAssistContent',
        'apps:whoCanBanUsers',
        'apps:whoCanContactOwner',
        'apps:whoCanDeleteAnyPost',
        'apps:whoCanDeleteTopics',
        'apps:whoCanDiscoverGroup',
        'apps:whoCanEnterFreeFormTags',
        'apps:whoCanHideAbuse',
        'apps:whoCanInvite',
        'apps:whoCanJoin',
        'apps:whoCanLeaveGroup',
        'apps:whoCanLockTopics',
        'apps:whoCanMakeTopicsSticky',
        'apps:whoCanMarkDuplicate',
        'apps:whoCanMarkFavoriteReplyOnAnyTopic',
        'apps:whoCanMarkFavoriteReplyOnOwnTopic',
        'apps:whoCanMarkNoResponseNeeded',
        'apps:whoCanModerateContent',
        'apps:whoCanModerateMembers',
        'apps:whoCanModifyMembers',
        'apps:whoCanModifyTagsAndCategories',
        'apps:whoCanMoveTopicsIn',
        'apps:whoCanMoveTopicsOut',
        'apps:whoCanPostAnnouncements',
        'apps:whoCanPostMessage',
        'apps:whoCanTakeTopics',
        'apps:whoCanUnassignTopic',
        'apps:whoCanUnmarkFavoriteReplyOnAnyTopic',
        'apps:whoCanViewGroup',
        'apps:whoCanViewMembership'
    ];

    let obj = {};
    keys.forEach(key => {
        let newKey = key.replace('apps:', '');
        obj[newKey] = item[key] ? item[key][0] : undefined;
    })

    return obj;
}
getGroupSetting.name: getGroupSetting
